column4: i cant think where else to ask on irc as this is the main place i know, I have buggered up GRUB and need to get back into windows, how can i do this so i can back up thigns then reinstall?
will the repair function on windows boot disk achieve me getting back into windows?
Try reinstallign GRUB from a livecd (I find Windows boot faster with GRUB installed anyway)
Have you completely wiped you Linux?
